Angle/Forward.description: Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that the angle points.

Angle/IsZero.description: Returns whether the pitch, yaw and roll are 0 or not.

Angle/Normalize.description: Normalizes the angles by applying a module with 360 to pitch, yaw and roll.

Angle/Right.description: Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that points right relative to the angle's direction.

Angle/RotateAroundAxis.description: Rotates the angle around the specified axis by the specified degrees.

Angle/Set.description: Copies pitch, yaw and roll from the second angle to the first.

Angle/SnapTo.description: Snaps the angle to nearest interval of degrees.

Angle/Up.description: Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that points up relative to the angle's direction.

Angle/Zero.description: Sets pitch, yaw and roll to 0. This function is faster than doing it manually.
